verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֣חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician בִּ֭נְגִינוֹת <WH5058> on Neginoth עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <WH8067> upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD אַל־ <WH408> Nor בְּאַפְּךָ֥ <WH639> me not in thine anger תוֹכִיחֵ֑נִי <WH3198> rebuke וְֽאַל־ <WH408> Nor בַּחֲמָתְךָ֥ <WH2534> me in thy hot displeasure תְיַסְּרֵֽנִי׃ <WH3256> neither chasten

חָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> Have mercy יְהוָה֮ <WH3069> God כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֻמְלַ֫ל <WH536> for I [am] weak אָ֥נִי <WH589> I רְפָאֵ֥נִי <WH7495> heal יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God כִּ֖י <WH3588> for נִבְהֲל֣וּ <WH926> are vexed עֲצָמָֽי׃ <WH6106> me for my bones
וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <WH5315> My soul נִבְהֲלָ֣ה <WH926> vexed מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> is also sore [וְאַתְּ כ] (וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you ק) יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> but thou O LORD עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתָֽי׃ <WH4970> long

שׁוּבָ֣ה <WH7725> Return יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD חַלְּצָ֣ה <WH2502> deliver נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul ה֝וֹשִׁיעֵ֗נִי <WH3467> oh save לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> because חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH2617> me for thy mercies'

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For אֵ֣ין <WH369> there בַּמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> For in death זִכְרֶ֑ךָ <WH2143> [there is] no remembrance בִּ֝שְׁא֗וֹל <WH7585> of thee in the grave מִ֣י <WH4310> who יֽוֹדֶה־ <WH3034> who shall give thee thanks לָּֽךְ׃

יָגַ֤עְתִּי ׀ <WH3021> I am weary בְּֽאַנְחָתִ֗י <WH585> with my groaning אַשְׂחֶ֣ה <WH7811> to swim בְכָל־ <WH3605> Every לַ֭יְלָה <WH3915> all the night מִטָּתִ֑י <WH4296> make I my bed בְּ֝דִמְעָתִ֗י <WH1832> with my tears עַרְשִׂ֥י <WH6210> my couch אַמְסֶֽה׃ <WH4529> I water

עָֽשְׁשָׁ֣ה <WH6244> is consumed מִכַּ֣עַס <WH3708> because of grief עֵינִ֑י <WH5869> Mine eye עָֽ֝תְקָ֗ה <WH6275> it waxeth old בְּכָל־ <WH3605> of all צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <WH6887> because of all mine enemies

ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> Depart מִ֭מֶּנִּי <WH4480> at כָּל־ <WH3605> all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> from me all ye workers אָ֑וֶן <WH205> of iniquity כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hath heard יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> for the LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice בִּכְיִֽי׃ <WH1065> of my weeping
שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hath heard יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD תְּחִנָּתִ֑י <WH8467> my supplication יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD תְּֽפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> my prayer יִקָּֽח׃ <WH3947> will receive

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ ׀ <WH954> be ashamed וְיִבָּהֲל֣וּ <WH926> vexed מְ֭אֹד <WH3966> and sore כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֹיְבָ֑י <WH341> Let all mine enemies יָ֝שֻׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> let them return יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> [and] be ashamed רָֽגַע׃ <WH7281> suddenly
